metadata.name: The Spirit Of Theyyam
metadata.description:
The Spirit of Theyyam -

Theyyam is considered as Dance Gods in Kerala which is performed to honour the heroes & ancestral spirits.

The name Theyyam has been given to it by adding two words ‘Deivam’ means God and ‘Aattam’ means dance .

Theyyam is believed to be having 456 different forms, each has its unique style, make-up, costumes, songs, choreography. The most prominent Theyyams are the Pottan, Gulikan, Bhagavati, Kari Chamundi, and Raktha Chamundi.

This is a contest winning Photograph shot in Kerala during Theyyam, which is enhanced by adding visual and sound effects.
